basics.name: Rose Karon
basics.label: Senior Product Owner/Manager with multi‑domain expertise and global experience
basics.summary: Over the past 15+ years I’ve delivered business‑critical products across multiple domains—gaming, e‑learning, social networking, marketing automation and CRM—while living and working in the Philippines, Singapore, China and Sweden. That international exposure has honed my ability to navigate diverse markets, cultures and regulatory environments, align global stakeholders and lead distributed agile teams. I combine empathy and clear communication to build trust, uncover true user needs and guide cross‑functional teams. I thrive on translating complex requirements into scalable, high‑impact solutions—whether launching a language‑learning platform to millions or rolling out CRM integrations for enterprise customers.

work.summary: Efficy provides customizable CRM solutions to businesses of all sizes.
highlights: Lead end‑to‑end delivery of multiple CRM integrations into core customer systems.
Defined and shipped marketing automation features used to power thousands of marketing automation flows across Europe.

work.summary: Kambi delivers B2B sports‑betting services to licensed operators in over 50 jurisdictions.
highlights: Led engineers to build and maintain high‑performance APIs for leading sportsbook brands in Europe and the US.
Spearheaded rollout of a redesigned landing page, improving engagement and conversion rates.
Designed and implemented back‑office tools to ensure and streamline regulatory compliance.

work.summary: SchoolApply connects students worldwide with institutions that match their goals.
highlights: Built a proof‑of‑concept platform for managing global school data, reducing manual effort.
Managed a distributed engineering team to deliver critical MVP features on schedule.
Authored and validated business requirements for a multi‑agency application system.

work.summary: SWK Industries develops innovative event‑technology platforms for conferences and expos.
highlights: Directed a fully remote engineering team, defining roadmaps and sprint plans.
Wrote detailed business specifications for seamless real‑time event‑tech integrations.

work.summary: EF is a global education leader partnering with the Olympic Committee and Clinton Foundation.
highlights: Developed an AEM‑based CMS proof of concept, improving content delivery and reducing costs.
Built ELK‑stack monitoring tools to detect and resolve issues proactively.
Introduced OKRs to align teams around measurable goals and drive performance.

work.position: Technical Project Manager / Head of PMO
work.summary: EF Learning Labs designs and builds scalable educational software used by millions.
highlights: Launched EF’s new language‑learning platform to over 1M users, including Rio 2016 Olympic volunteers.
Coordinated five cross‑functional teams to deliver on aggressive global release timelines.

work.summary: MyCube offers a digital life management platform for content exchange and monetization.
highlights: Conceptualized and delivered the mobile app MVP, collaborating closely with UX designers.
Documented and launched the web platform MVP, streamlining user workflows for sharing.
Designed the back‑office member services module, improving operational efficiency.

work.summary: Laron is an IT‑consulting firm specializing in online gaming solutions.
highlights: Defined and enforced documentation standards across projects.
Led cross‑functional teams to deliver gaming platform enhancements on time.

work.summary: Strategem develops software for the MANSION group’s global gaming platforms.
highlights: Authored business requirements for the MANSION Promoter Program (affiliate & loyalty).
Defined vision and specifications for a prepaid‑card payment integration.

work.summary: Bayview provides BPO services to gaming operators across Asia and Europe.
highlights: Led launch of multiple Playtech‑powered casinos in the Philippines.
Served as account manager for Playtech licensees across Asia.

work.summary: Anxa expanded into Australia, the USA, and China during my tenure.
highlights: Collaborated with the CEO on international market launches.
Recruited 30+ staff across design, marketing, sales, IT, and HR functions.

education.institution: University of the Philippines Los Baños

references.name: Tristan Guo, Technical Lead
references.reference: Rose is the best Technical Project Manager I have ever worked with... under big pressure, she helped us deliver ahead of time. Her optimism and clarity drove the team to success.

references.name: Brian McKay, VP of Product Development
references.reference: Rose played a critical role in a major rollout for EF, working across teams, mitigating risks, and delivering a flawless release. Her leadership inspired everyone to exceed expectations.

references.name: Rasmus Rasmusson, VP of Marketing
references.reference: Rose is a well‑liked project manager with great attention to detail and energy. Her communication skills keep distributed teams aligned and motivated.

references.name: Raul Costa, Product and CRM Manager
references.reference: Rose brings professionalism, positivity, and high performance to every project. She keeps stakeholders informed, focuses on results, and lifts morale even under challenge.
